file_content.text: Victory for Mandalore the Avenger! Victory for the clans! Ha!
Factory's gears are still grinding, but it's mostly offline. And we're rearming for the first time in years.
Thank your spy for bringing the chance to us. The glory days of the Mando'ade are back.
It was a good battle, but I can't stop them. They'll want to reclaim honor fighting men, not machines... and Zakuul won't be enough.
The struggle won't end with Arcann's fall. Someone will need to replace Zakuul's Skytroopers. Keep a whole empire in line.
You could help Zakuul rebuild.
So, what? You want the clans to be glorified police?
We'll need more than police to stop rebellions and rogue knights and who knows what else.
Huh. It's a thought. We've got a while yet, though.
You can stop them, and we both know endless war will destroy your culture.
You need to convince them.
The old guard wants the glory days back.
Then find young leaders who support peace. Or something closer to it.
Huh. Torian. You looking to march all over the galaxy again?
There are enough hunts out there without war.
Yeah. "Young leaders."
For now, though, I'm granting your request.
You want a challenge? You've fought the Republic before. What about turning on the Sith? We could give you supplies, money, anything you need.
Then target the Empire.
The Empire stuck by us. But it's true the Republic's never been totally... satisfying to raid. I'll think about it.
When we beat Zakuul, and the clans still want blood, turn your guns on the Republic. The Empire and the Mandalorians were allies once; they can be again.
Then target the Republic.
You say that with authority. We'll see what happens, but... it's always good to have a clear target.
For now... Torian! I'm granting your request.
Vor entye, Mand'alor.
If this alliance is going to work out, you need a clan representative at your side. Someone to liaise with me and keep you alive.
I volunteered. Seemed more interesting than anything here.
Huh! Come to join us for another victory celebration? Climb up the heap of Mandalorian bodies, look over the carnage?
Khomo.
Blasted lot of warriors died without honor to get you that droid of yours. Their names will be forgotten.
Khomo's right. Maybe not your fault, but this... it has to be worth it.
We're going to beat Zakuul. This is only one step, but it is a necessary one.
It'll be worth it.
I'll hold you to that.
I offered you an alliance and the key to stopping the Eternal Fleet. But I didn't plan your battle. Mandalore did.
Clearly, Mandalore is weak.
You.
She's a fine bounty hunter. Whether she's a leader is something you should ask yourselves.
We'll do that. Be sure of it.
One more wrong word, and this alliance ends. Zakuul be damned.
Torian!
Mandalore?
You'll accompany our friend here. Represent the clans. Fight. Make it worthwhile.
Think your people could learn something, working with a Mandalorian. What do you say?
You were willing to sacrifice yourself in that factory--and you've shown I can trust you. I'd be proud to have you with me.
Glad to have you aboard.
I won't stop you from coming, but doesn't Clan Cadera need you?
What about your clan?
Not much left of Clan Cadera.
There are secrets I'm not ready to share with the Mandalorians. Don't expect full access to my ship or my people.
You'll be treated as a spy.
Fair enough.
You still want to go with her?
You still want to go with him?
Yes.
Then I'm charging you with watching out for the clans' interests. Protect the people. Go.
Guess we're really back.
We have what we've always had. We're just together to share it again.
You never left my heart.
You say it better than me.
Let's go home.
We're back. No bounties--just a war to fight.
Let's get to work.
I'll introduce you to everyone later, but fair warning: if you thought the last group was strange...
Wait till you meet the crew.
I've been living with Mandalorians. I can put up with a lot.
Let's save the galaxy.
We're not just hunting bounties anymore. This is for the whole galaxy.
This is bigger than before.
I know. I've been living it.
Still good to be back.
Ret'urcye mhi--until next time. Both of you.
Guess we're both alive.
You look like osik. Clan Cadera survives another battle.
Ah, Khomo. Blast it all.
What happened today--your losses--I share responsibility, and I share your grief. Let my Alliance give you resources and manpower to strengthen the clans.
Let me help you rebuild.
We don't need your help.
Don't we? I'll think about it.
